A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi was such a badly written movie I think it destroyed the franchise. The pacing was terrible\, intense scenes were ruined by slapstick comedy. Heroes weren't heroic to the point that this movie somehow made me dislike Leia.  The bad guys \"The First Order\" were ridiculously incompetent\, with a massively oversized fleet being the only thing making them intimidating\, like the Force Awakens never happened and there base of operations wasn't just destroyed.
